title: How to Block Paltalk Advertisements

steps.headline: Open up your local disk.
steps.description: In most computers, it is usually (C:).

steps.headline: Open the folder "Etc" and look for a file named "Hosts."
Right click on the file "hosts" and click on "Send it as a shortcut to desktop" menu.
Go to your desktop.
steps.description: Close all the files and folders and look for a shortcut of the file named "hosts" in which you just created. This host file determines which domain is allowed or restricted on your computer.
